original_text: “Let Aaron be gathered to his people, for he shall not enter the land that I have given to the people of Israel, because you rebelled against my command at the waters of Meribah.
korean_text: 아론은 그 조상들에게로 돌아가고 내가 이스라엘 자손에게 준 땅에는 들어가지 못하리니 이는 너희가 므리바 물에서 내 말을 거역한 까닭이니라

sentences.original_text: Let Aaron be gathered to his people
for he shall not enter the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 땅에 들어가지 못할 것이니

sentences.original_text: that I have given to the people of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅은 내가 이스라엘 백성에게 주었기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: because you rebelled against my command
